Description: A unique identifier for this specific incentive/law/regulation.
The two letter abbreviation of the state in which the incentive/law/regulation was enacted and is active. The code 'US' represents federal laws and the code 'DC' is Washington D.C.
The brief title assigned to the incentive/law/regulation description.
Description of the incentive/law/regulation, including applicable legislative references.
The date the enacting legislation (if applicable) was signed into law.
The date the incentive/law/regulation was updated through new legislation or rulemaking.
The true or false value used to distinguish between recent federal executive actions (TRUE) and active incentives/laws/regulations (FALSE).
The numerical value assigned to a description to show the order in which it is displayed online within a jurisdiction (state).
The category that the incentive/law/regulation falls under, described below:
The agency with primary responsibility for federal incentives/regulations.
The date the last significant update to the law was made.
The date the incentive/law/regulation is set to end.
The date that an incentive/law/regulation is no longer relevant to the database. This may include longstanding Executive Orders or laws requiring legislative studies that have been completed.
The date legislation is enacted or a rulemaking is finalized to repeal the incentive/law/regulation.
For local incentive/regulation descriptions, the category that the incentive/regulation falls under, described below:
Vehicle Purchase and Infrastructure Development Incentives
The fuel, vehicle, or other major technology type the incentive/regulation relates to, given as a code value descibed below:
The type of incentive, given as a code value described below:
The type of regulation, given as a code value described below:
The type of user subject to the law/regulation or able to claim the incentive, given as a code value described below:

column4: Alternative Fuel Vehicle (AFV) Manufacturer or Retrofitter

Description: The URL associated with any bill or legislative reference included in the description.
